location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 35. TO ILLUSTRATE OPERATIONS IN THE JABAL HAMRIN; OCTOBER AND DECEMBER, 1917.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 280 x 264mm, on sheet 335 x 320mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume IV, and shows a region around the Jabal Hamrin hills in central and eastern Iraq, indicating towns, settlements, routes, railways and watercourses. Sketch marks give some indication of relief, and a brief note below the title describes the extent of the railway.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1927.
